blocks.title: Intro
blocks.content: Digit recognition stands out as one of the most invaluable tools in our daily lives, seamlessly integrated into various applications. From handwritten digit recognition on postal envelopes to automatic text recognition in scanned documents, its applications are diverse and impactful. In this project, I leveraged the power of digital recognition to tackle the MNIST dataset, a benchmark dataset readily available in the sklearn library. Using a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) architecture comprising four layers, I delved into the world of image recognition.

blocks.caption: Number Plate Detection Mechanism using Computer Vision
